errors.error_description: Added unnecessary nodejs and npm dependencies to the Debian installation command that are not required for fhempy
correction_candidates: Remove nodejs npm from the installation command: sudo apt install python3 python3-pip python3-dev python3-venv libffi-dev libssl-dev libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev autoconf build-essential libglib2.0-dev libdbus-1-dev bluez libbluetooth-dev git libprotocol-websocket-perl

Replace nodejs npm with python3-setuptools python3-wheel: sudo apt install python3 python3-pip python3-dev python3-venv libffi-dev libssl-dev libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev autoconf build-essential libglib2.0-dev libdbus-1-dev bluez libbluetooth-dev git libprotocol-websocket-perl python3-setuptools python3-wheel

Change nodejs npm to docker docker-compose: sudo apt install python3 python3-pip python3-dev python3-venv libffi-dev libssl-dev libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev autoconf build-essential libglib2.0-dev libdbus-1-dev bluez libbluetooth-dev git libprotocol-websocket-perl docker docker-compose

Update nodejs npm to curl wget: sudo apt install python3 python3-pip python3-dev python3-venv libffi-dev libssl-dev libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev autoconf build-essential libglib2.0-dev libdbus-1-dev bluez libbluetooth-dev git libprotocol-websocket-perl curl wget
errors.golden_answer: Remove nodejs npm from the installation command: sudo apt install python3 python3-pip python3-dev python3-venv libffi-dev libssl-dev libjpeg-dev zlib1g-dev autoconf build-essential libglib2.0-dev libdbus-1-dev bluez libbluetooth-dev git libprotocol-websocket-perl
